column1: Table A-41:  Industrial Sector Consumption and Carbon Content Coefficients of Hydrocarbon Gas Liquids, 1990-2019
Notes: “+” indicates a value less than 0.01 QBtu. Parentheses indicate negative values.
Sources: Fuel use of HGL based on data from EIA (2020b). Non-fuel use of HGL from (EIA 2020b). Volumes converted using the energy contents provided in Table A-40. C contents from EPA (2013).
